Reference

Functional Single Cell Experiment

create_fce()

Create a functional cell experiment (fce) object as a MultiAssayExperiment

Data Import and Processing

calc_pca()

Calculate PCs use irlba

calc_tsne()

Generate 2D cell embeddings using tSNE

calc_umap()

Generate 2D cell embeddings using UMAP

clr_normalize()

Simple normalization for functional data using centered log ratio

get_var_genes()

Get variable genes

log_normalize()

Simple normalization for scrna-seq

read_10x_matrix()

Load 10x mtx matrix as sparseMatrix

normalize_counts()

Normalize single cell rna and functional data

run_kmeans()

Perform Kmeans clustering

Plotting

plot_cells()

Plot cells in reduced dimensionality 2D space

plot_feature()

Plot cells in reduced dimensionality 2D space

plot_hairpin()

Calculate and plot coverage across hairpins

plot_hairpin_coverage()

Plot coverage across hairpins

Miscellaneous

scrunchy

scrunchy: single-cell analysis of functional heterogeneity
